FlowDefinition.description: Captures input via screenflow for Work Orders using the 'Sourcing US - Lightning' record type. May be launched from the Account or Opportunity via the 'Sourcing' quick action button. Flow runs as system so that the field level security on 'Type of Request' field on the Work Order object may be edited in the Flow, while keeping the field read only outside of the Flow for all but admin users.
FlowDefinition.masterLabel: Work Order - Field Sourcing Work Order Request
